user_data.target_needs: I wanted comfortable and reliable underwear that could accommodate my active lifestyle while also being cost-effective.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a more affordable replacement for a high-end product I previously purchased. However, the fit and comfort of this product did not meet my expectations, leading me to feel disappointed and ultimately decide to stick with the more expensive option.

I needed reliable underwear that could withstand my active lifestyle, particularly while walking the golf course. The combination of comfort, performance, and price made this product appealing, and my previous experiences with various brands helped me make a confident choice.

I was looking for high-quality underwear that offered comfort and durability. The product's features, such as cooling channels and a comfortable waistband, aligned perfectly with my needs, and the positive reviews reinforced my decision.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer high-quality, well-fitting clothing that is comfortable and durable, especially for activities like golfing. I value products that offer good material and construction, as well as consistent sizing that simplifies the shopping experience. I appreciate items that perform well under physical activity and provide flexibility, such as shorts and pants with stretch features. Additionally, I tend to favor brands that have proven reliability and positive experiences in the past. On the other hand, I dislike products that do not meet my expectations in terms of fit and comfort, particularly in underwear, where I have a low tolerance for discomfort. I also find poor value for money and subpar quality unappealing, especially when it comes to everyday essentials.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and reliable underwear that can keep up with my active lifestyle without breaking the bank. within my expected price range: [23.98, 25.54]
What specific activities or sports do you engage in that require durable and comfortable underwear for your active lifestyle?

I play a lot of golf, so I need underwear that can keep me comfortable and supported while I'm out on the course. Comfort and durability are key for me, especially when I'm walking the golf course for hours.
What specific features do you prioritize in terms of comfort for your underwear while playing golf?

I prioritize underwear with moisture-wicking properties to keep me dry and comfortable during long hours on the golf course. Breathable fabric is essential to prevent any chafing or discomfort while I'm active. A comfortable waistband that doesn't dig in is also crucial for me to focus on my game without any distractions.

Item No.1 : Item Title: <Golf Shirts for Men Regular and Big and Tall Size Golf Polos Dry Fit Mens Polo Shirts Short Sleeve> / Item ID: B07C55QD3M / Price: $18.95 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Shirts', 'Polos'] / Description: ["Looking for the perfect golf shirt? Look no further than the Opna Golf Polo for Men. These mens short sleeve shirts are designed with comfort in mind, featuring stretch fabric and set-in sleeves that allow you to move easily on the course. The moisture wicking fabric will keep you feeling cool and relaxed, no matter how hot the weather or how much pressure you're under. And with its refined look, you'll feel confident and stylish as you take on the green. Our Men's Golf Polo offers a soft, relaxed fit and excellent range of motion. The collar is relaxed to help prevent curling, and the shirt is available in both regular and Big and Tall sizes. Made with Dry Fit technology, these polos are moisture wicking, soft, breathable, and lightweight. The Interlock fabric is resistant to fading, pilling, wrinkles, and shrinkage, and the shirt is machine washable for easy care. Available in true US sizes from Small to 3XLT, the Opna Golf Polo is a must-have for any golfer. Our men's golf polo is a must-have for any golfer's wardrobe. Part of our collection of men's golf clothes, this collared shirt is both stylish and practical."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <PGA TOUR Men's Airflux Solid Mesh Short Sleeve Golf Polo Shirt (Sizes S-4x)> / Item ID: B091N41WL4 / Price: $19.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Shirts', 'Polos'] / Description: ["If you're looking for the best golf shirt for men, this PGA TOUR Airflux Mesh golf shirt is packed with performance features to keep you comfortable from the first to last hole and beyond. Crafted from Airflux ventilated mesh fabric, the lightweight golf top is designed to be breathable to keep you cool on hot sunny days for ultimate comfort. Moisture-wicking technology moves perspiration away from your body for a dry fit that will keep you feeling fresh. Built-in UPF 15 sun protection prevents the sun's damaging rays from penetrating the fabric to help protect your skin as you play under bright blue skies. The solid polo shirt is easy to pair with other PGA TOUR golf apparel. This men's polo shirt also looks great for casual wear for gatherings with family and friends or at the office. Easy to clean, just throw the polo in the washing machine after your round with your other golf clothing. The innovative material is designed to stay smooth and keep its good looks wear after wear. With a ribbed collar and three button placket, the innovative design is sure to make it a favorite piece in your golf wear. Available in regular and big & tall sizes in a classic fit, it's a great choice for men of all sizes. Those looking for golf shirts for big guys will be happy to know this shirt goes up to size 4X Large. You are sure to look sharp on and of the course in this PGA Tour Airflux golf polo designed to keep you performing at your best."]

Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Boxer Briefs, Cool Dri Moisture-Wicking Underwear, Cotton No-Ride-up for Men, Multi-Packs Available> / Item ID: B0BH113WW9 / Price: $25.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ["This men's boxer briefs multipack is made from 100% cotton that's soft and breathable for everyday comfort (heathered styles are a cotton-rich blend). Our moisture-wicking underwear is designed with Cool Comfort® fabric that helps keep you cool no matter what your day brings. Our experts also designed these men's underwear with no-ride-up construction and a Comfort Flex® waistband that stretches and moves with you. Plus, you can throw them right in the washer on laundry day. We also love how these tagless boxer brief underwear sets are available in multiple color and pack options, so you can choose the one that works best for you."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Fruit of the Loom Men's 5pk Beyondsoft Boxer Brief> / Item ID: B071NJDDTW / Price: $16.49 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ["Looking for your next go-to pair of underwear Fruit of the Loom men's beyond soft boxer briefs, 5-pack offer the comfort and style of a boxer combined with the support of a brief. Beyond soft is made of durable fabric that shrinks less than 100 percent cotton. Plus, beyond soft naturally wicks moisture away, keeping you feeling dry all day. The traditional fly provides support and the soft waistband will keep you comfortable in every situation. The Fruit of the Loom men's beyond soft boxer brief, 5-pack offers our legs don't ride up feature ensuring the legs stay in place all day. Each Fruit of the Loom men's beyond soft boxer brief is designed tag free for all day comfort and shrinks less wash after wash."]
